message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $800000 to you. Let's get this deal done!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to the value I place on the product. I am willing to pay $950000 for your product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $1100000. This is a significant discount from my initial offer, and I believe it reflects the value of the product for you.  Let's make this deal happen!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position and would like to propose a price of $1050000 for your product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
